'''Cooked cod''' is a [[food]] item obtained by cooking [[raw cod]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Mob loot ===
{{Drop sources|Cooked Cod}}

=== Generated loot ===
{{LootChestItem|cooked-cod}}

=== Cooking ===
[[Raw cod]] can be [[cooked]] in a [[furnace]], [[smoker]], or [[campfire]]. Each piece of cooked cod removed from a furnace output slot gives 0.35 [[experience]] (22.4 experience per stack).

{{smelting
|Raw Cod
|Cooked Cod
|0,35
}}

=== Trading ===
{{Trade sources}}

== Usage ==

=== Food ===
To eat cooked cod, press and hold {{control|use}} while it is selected in the hotbar. Eating one restores {{hunger|5}} [[hunger]] and 6 hunger [[Hunger#Mechanics|saturation]].

=== Wolves ===
Cooked cod can be used to feed a wolf not at full health, healing by {{hp|10|mob=1}}. However, {{in|Bedrock}}, unlike other wolf food, cooked cod cannot be used to speed up the growth of baby wolves nor used to breed them and can only be fed to a wolf that is not at full health.
